original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 309.00/80 against the US dollar, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields closed down on Tuesday and the rupee closed stronger at 309.00/80 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 27.10/60 percent, down from 28.00/50 percent at Monday’s close.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 was quoted at 29.00/30percent, down from 29.30/30.00 per cent at last close.
The rupee closed at 311.00/50 against the US dollar in the spot market steady from the last close at 311.70/312.20. (Colombo/May16/2023)
